CoCaLa Team won Causality 4 Climate NeurIPS competition

With an average AUC-ROC score of 0.917 our CoCaLa Team won the Causality 4 Climate NeurIPS competition. You can find our code here. And watch the recording of the NeurIPS session.

stagedtrees v1.0.1

The new version of the R-package stagedtrees is available on CRAN.

This new version implements some bug fixes and two new functions: get_stage and get_path.

The new functions can be used to obtain the stage associated to a given path or viceversa, the paths relative to a given stage.

model <- PhDArticles[,1:3] %>% full %>% bhc.sevt

get_stage(model, c(Articles = "1-2",Gender = "male"))

## [1] "5"

get_path(model, "Kids", 5)

##   Articles Gender
## 1        0   male
## 3      1-2   male
## 5       >2   male

News

  • fix #73; naive.sevt not passing distance arg
  • fix indep, probabilities should not be of class table (it was triggering a bug in summary)
  • fix subtree, now removing unused probabilities (it was triggering a bug in summary)
  • fixing testing without long double
  • fixing some errors in testing
  • update some tests with unquoted expression
  • new functions get_stage and get_path and relative tests
